oai_dc:dc.dc:title: US Navy Dahlgren solid shot projectile
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Artillery projectiles of this type were designed for the heavy cannon used on US Navy gunboats. This particular shell was used in the 50 lbs. Dahlgren rifled cannon. The solid iron shot weighed 50 lbs. and required over 3 lbs. of gun powder to fire it.; The maximum range of the Dahlgren rifled cannon was over 2,220 yards. Many of the US Navy vessels patroling the rivers of Tennessee utilized heavy cannon like the Dahlgren.
